Indio.Desert Palms, California:
Desert Palms is a census-designated place in the Coachella Valley of eastern Riverside County, southern California.


== Geography ==
Desert Palms is in the Colorado Desert, at an elevation of 112 feet (34 m).
According to the United States Census Bureau, the CDP covers an area of 2.7 square miles (6.9 km²), 99.97% of it land and 0.03% of it water.
